00032       function                install_step_1()
00033       {
00034             $CachedFS = get_package( 'cached_fs' );
00035             $Page = $CachedFS->file_get_contents( "./install/res/templates/install_template_1.tpl" );
00036             print( $Page );
00037             exit( 0 );

00054       function                process_connection_error( $Silent )
00055       {
00056             if( $Silent === false )
00057             {
00058                   $CachedFS = get_package( 'cached_fs' );
00059                   $Page = $CachedFS->file_get_contents( "./install/res/templates/install_template_2.tpl" );
00060                   $Page = str_replace( '{error_message}' , 'An error occured while database connection' , $Page );
00061 
00062                   $Security = get_package( 'security' );
00063                   $Page = str_replace( '{host}' , $Security->get_gp( 'host' , 'string' , '' ) , $Page );
00064                   $Page = str_replace( '{database}' , $Security->get_gp( 'database' , 'string' , '' ) , $Page );
00065                   $Page = str_replace( '{prefix}' , $Security->get_gp( 'prefix' , 'string' , '' ) , $Page );
00066                   $Page = str_replace( '{user}' , $Security->get_gp( 'user' , 'string' , '' ) , $Page );
00067                   $Page = str_replace( '{password}' , $Security->get_gp( 'password' , 'string' , '' ) , $Page );
00068                   
00069                   print( $Page );
00070                   exit( 0 );
00071             }
00072       }
00073       
00108       function                process_step_2( $Host , $Database , $Prefix , $User , $Password , $Silent = false )
00109       {
00110             $DatabaseAlgorithms = get_package( 'database::database_algorithms' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00111             $CachedFS = get_package( 'cached_fs' );
00112             $CachedFS->file_put_contents( 
00113                   "packages/_core_data/conf/cf_mysql_database" , "$Host#$User#$Password#$Database#$Prefix"
00114             );
00115             
00116             if( $DatabaseAlgorithms->try_connect() )
00117             {
00118                   $DBScript = file_get_contents( './install/sql/data.sql' , 'cleaned' );
00119                   $DBScript = str_replace( '{prefix}' , $Prefix , $DBScript );
00120                   $DatabaseAlgorithms->execute_query_set( $DBScript );
00121                   if( $Silent === false )
00122                   {
00123                         header( 'Location: ./install.php?page=3' );
00124                         exit( 0 );
00125                   }
00126             }
00127             else
00128             {
00129                   process_connection_error( $Silent );
00130             }
00131       }
00132       
00143       function                      show_step_2_form()
00144       {
00145             $CachedFS = get_package( 'cached_fs' );
00146             $Page = $CachedFS->file_get_contents( "./install/res/templates/install_template_2.tpl" );
00147             
00148             $Needles = array( '{host}' , '{user}' , '{password}' , '{database}' , '{prefix}' , '{error_message}' );
00149             
00150             $Config = $CachedFS->file_get_contents( "packages/_core_data/conf/cf_mysql_database" );
00151             $Replacements = array_merge( explode( '#' , $Config ) , array( '' ) );
00152             
00153             print( str_replace( $Needles , $Replacements , $Page ) );
00154             exit( 0 );
00155       }
00156       
00171       function                install_step_2( $Silent = false )
00172       {
00173             $Security = get_package( 'security' );
00174             
00175             if( $Security->get_gp( 'setup_db' ) )
00176             {
00177                   process_step_2( 
00178                         $Security->get_gp( 'host' , 'string' , '' ) , $Security->get_gp( 'database' , 'string' , '' ) , 
00179                         $Security->get_gp( 'prefix' , 'string' , '' ) , $Security->get_gp( 'user' , 'string' , '' ) , 
00180                         $Security->get_gp( 'password' , 'string' , '' ) , $Silent
00181                   );
00182             }
00183             else
00184             {
00185                   show_step_2_form();
00186             }
00187       }

00207       function                process_step_3( $HttpHost , $Silent = false )
00208       {
00209             $HttpHost = rtrim( $HttpHost , '/\\' );
00210             $HtAccess = file_get_contents( './install/res/templates/tpl.htaccess' );
00211             $HtAccess = str_replace( '{http_host}' , $HttpHost , $HtAccess );
00212             file_put_contents( '.htaccess' , $HtAccess );
00213             
00214             file_put_contents( 
00215                   './packages/_core_data/conf/cf_settings' , "HTTP_HOST=$HttpHost\r\nGZIP_TRAFFIC=false"
00216             );
00217             
00218             if( $Silent === false )
00219             {
00220                   header( 'Location: ./install.php?page=4' );
00221                   exit( 0 );
00222             }
00223       }
00224       
00243       function                install_step_3( $HttpHost , $Silent = false )
00244       {
00245             $CachedFS = get_package( 'cached_fs' );
00246             $Security = get_package( 'security' );
00247             
00248             if( $HttpHost === false )
00249             {
00250                   if( $Silent === false )
00251                   {
00252                         $Page = $CachedFS->file_get_contents( "./install/res/templates/install_template_3.tpl" );
00253                         $Page = str_replace( 
00254                               '{http_root}' , 
00255                               rtrim( 'http://'.$_SERVER[ 'SERVER_NAME' ].dirname( $_SERVER[ 'REQUEST_URI' ] ) , '/\\' ) , 
00256                               $Page
00257                         );
00258                         print( $Page );
00259                         exit( 0 );
00260                   }
00261             }
00262             else
00263             {
00264                   process_step_3( $HttpHost , $Silent );
00265             }
00266       }

00304       function                process_installation_steps()
00305       {
00306             $Security = get_package( 'security' );
00307             $Page = $Security->get_gp( 'page' , 'integer' , 1 );
00308             
00309             switch( $Page )
00310             {
00311                   case( 1 ):install_step_1();
00312                   
00313                   case( 2 ):install_step_2( false );
00314                   
00315                   case( 3 ):
00316                         install_step_3( $Security->get_gp( 'http_root' , 'string' , false ) , false );
00317                   break;
00318                   
00319                   case( 4 ):install_step_4();
00320             }
00321       }
00322       
00333       function                run_installation_wizard()
00334       {
00335             try
00336             {
00337                   if( isset( $_GET[ 'auto_install' ] ) === true )
00338                   {
00339                         $DBS = file_get_contents( './install/conf/cf_db_settings' );
00340                         $DBS = explode( '#' , $DBS );
00341                         
00342                         install_step_2( $DBS[ 0 ] , $DBS[ 1 ] , $DBS[ 2 ] , $DBS[ 3 ] , $DBS[ 4 ] , true );
00343                         
00344                         $HttpHost = rtrim( 'http://'.$_SERVER[ 'SERVER_NAME' ].dirname( $_SERVER[ 'REQUEST_URI' ] ) , '/\\' );                        
00345                         install_step_3( $HttpHost , true );
00346                   }
00347                   else
00348                   {
00349                         process_installation_steps();
00350                   }
00351             }
00352             catch( Exception $e )
00353             {
00354                   process_script_error( true , $e );
00355             }
00356       }
00357       
00358       /* running wizard */
00359       run_installation_wizard();
